alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Floyd (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 4:39PM CDT until March 31 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Floyd County in north central Iowa... Chickasaw County in northeastern Iowa... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 439 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Marble Rock to Parkersburg, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Charles City and Floyd around 450 PM CDT. Fredericksburg around 525 PM CDT. Lawler around 535 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include County Roads B 60 And T 18, Bradford, Chickasaw, Roseville, Oakwood, New Hampton Airport and Powersville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central and northeastern Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
